p: Sixty specific pathogen-free (SPF) Sprague-Dawley (SD) rats, 30 male rats, and 50 female rats, with a mean weight of 200Â±30 g, were purchased from the Experimental Animal Research Center of Xinjiang Medical University (Animal License No. SCXK 2011-0004). Standard food and drink were given, and the study began after two days of feeding. The study was approved by the Ethics Committee of Shihezi University (Approval No. 2015-030-01).
